items.sentence: When Tom saw Mary, his scowl turned into a smile.
You two need to settle your quarrel here and now.
Perhaps we can salvage some parts off this plane.
Why would anyone think that that was a good idea?
I suspect Tom will do whatever you ask him to do.
I don't think that anybody really understands me.
The girls you were talking to aren't my students.
Tom wished he could've spent more time with Mary.
According to one website, low carb diets do work.
There's a vending machine at the end of the hall.
